text: Langston Faizon Santisima (born June 4, 1968), better known as Faizon Love, is an Cuban-American actor and comedian. He appeared in Elf (2003). ==Early life== Love was born Langston Faizon Santisima in Santiago de Cuba, Cuba on June 4, 1968. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Faizon Love
